Footwear. Fashion.
Global Reach. Global Presence.
We are an industry leader.

For over 50 years we've created and strategically built up licensed and branded footwear products for kids of all ages, teens and adults.

We are a global leader in brand, character and entertainment licensing. Our universal knowledge and awareness of trends, enables us to act fast and be first to market.
